name: Gift Voucher for One on One Photography Course
description:
This Gift Voucher entitles the recipient to:

3 hour One on One Photography Course ($290)
(choose from course drop down menu below). For full course details please click on the courses menu link on the right hand side of this page.

All products and services provided by Julie G Photography come with a 100% Money Back Guarantee.

BOOKING DETAILS
Course bookings will be made at a mutually agreeable time and date within the Sydney area (weekdays or weekends). Suggested locations: The Rocks, Circular Quay, The Royal Botanical Gardens, Centennial Park (Paddington), and Bicentennial Park (Homebush).

GIFT VOUCHER DETAILS
Please include your full name, contact phone number and email address upon checkout. Gift vouchers can be sent directly to recipient or mailed to the purchaser. You will be contacted by phone to arrange the details of your Gift Voucher.

Gift vouchers will be valid for 6 months. For urgent orders Gift Vouchers can be emailed to the recipient.

name: One on One Photography Coaching - Personalised Photography Tuition
description:
If you need personalised help with your photography or prefer to learn in an unstructured way, one on one coaching can be a great solution to help take your photography to the next level.

PHOTOGRAPHY COACHING FOR INDIVIDUALS
Photography coaching sessions are tailored to your existing skill level and interests. Whether you'd like to learn how to better use your camera, improve your family portraits, photography coaching can be a great way to fast track your learning.

PHOTOGRAPHY COACHING FOR BUSINESSES
Photography coaching is a great way to improve the photography skills of business owners and their staff, and can benefit any business who takes their own photography, such as real estate agents, small business owners, boutique and shop owners, and any business who sells their products online.

BENEFITS
100% Money Back Guarantee, full attention with 1 on 1 coaching, learn technical skills to take better photos, discover how to compose more interesting and effective images, learn to take more professional images of your family or for your business, increase individual or staff skill levels

REQUIREMENTS
Beginner to intermediate levels are welcome. Use your SLR camera or any camera with manual controls. You may also use a compact camera, depending on your learning requirements.

BOOKING DETAILS
Course bookings will be made at a mutually agreeable time and date within the Sydney area (weekdays or weekends). Suggested locations: The Rocks, Circular Quay, The Royal Botanical Gardens, Centennial Park (Paddington), and Bicentennial Park (Homebush).

name: One on One Photography Composition Course - Learn to Create Stunning Photos
description:
Discover how to give your images more of a "Wow Factor". During this 3 hour One on One Composition Course you'll learn professional tips and techniques to start designing well composed images. You'll also learn to previsualize and think more creatively for more successful results.

TOPICS COVERED
The rule of thirds , use of line, camera viewpoint, creative framing, dominance and balance, shape and form, and pattern and repetition, use of focus, negative space, texture, choice of background, basic colour theory and cropping to improve composition
 
BENEFITS
Regular practical exercises throughout course, 100% Money Back Guarantee, receive full attention with 1 on 1 learning, quality handouts provided, create more appealing images

REQUIREMENTS
None - beginner to intermediate levels are welcome. This course has been designed for anyone who owns a camera, including mobile phone camera, iphone, compact camera or SLR.  

BOOKING DETAILS
Course bookings will be made at a mutually agreeable time and date within the Sydney area (weekdays or weekends). Suggested locations: The Rocks, Circular Quay, The Royal Botanical Gardens, Centennial Park (Paddington), and Bicentennial Park (Homebush).

name: One on One Photography Essentials Course - Use your SLR Camera to its Full Potential
description:
This 3 hour One on One beginners photography course has been designed with regular practical exercises for a great learning outcome. By discovering how to use the settings on your camera, your confidence levels will increase, and you'll have the tools to start taking more creative and professional looking images.

TOPICS COVERED
Shooting modes, depth of field, noise, exposure, metering modes, manual and auto focus, auto focus points, auto focus modes, drive/release modes, lenses, plus more!
 
BENEFITS
Regular practical exercises throughout course, quality handouts, 100% Money Back Guarantee, receive full attention with 1 on 1 learning, and improve your photography by learning to use the manual settings on your camera.

REQUIREMENTS
None - beginner to intermediate levels are welcome. You'll need an SLR camera or a camera with manual controls.

BOOKING DETAILS
Course bookings will be made at a mutually agreeable time and date within the Sydney area (weekdays or weekends). Suggested locations: The Rocks, Circular Quay, The Royal Botanical Gardens, Centennial Park (Paddington), and Bicentennial Park (Homebush).

name: One on One Portrait Photography Course - The Secrets of Eye Catching Portraits
description:
During this three hour One on One Portrait Photography Course you'll learn professional tips and techniques to help turn your snapshots into captivating,  professional looking portraits.

Learn about the importance of lighting for creating flattering portraits. Learn how to choose the right aperture to create more professional looking images. Learn how to manipulate lighting using reflectors and diffusers, plus lots more!

TOPICS COVERED
Types of lighting, lenses for portraits, exposure and metering, taking outdoor portraits, problem solving lighting issues, using reflectors and diffusers, getting good expressions, choosing locations, camera angles, posing tips and legal issues.

BENEFITS
Regular practical exercises throughout course, 100% Money Back Guarantee, receive full attention with 1 on 1 learning, quality handouts, 2 hours shooting time using a with your family member, friend or partner, the opportunity to create professional portraits to share with family and friends.

REQUIREMENTS
Photography Essentials Course or equivalent knowledge.  You'll need an SLR camera or a camera with manual controls.

BOOKING DETAILS
Course bookings will be made at a mutually agreeable time and date within the Sydney area (weekdays or weekends). Suggested locations: The Rocks, Circular Quay, The Royal Botanical Gardens, Centennial Park (Paddington), and Bicentennial Park (Homebush).
